Posts.EditableText:
Trying to get started.  Open a new Quest game and give it a name.  Then save.  But, when I return to the "Create" tab, it's not there.  OTOH, when I save a Squiffy game, it's saved right there (in Create tab).  What on earth am I missing?

Working the on-line versions.

Thanks
Posts.HTML:
